content: 18 18 srt bsr 9 rs *k to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * a total of 2 times k to ts kts k to incm m1r sincm work sts as they appear to borm 2 short row and 2 sts added to front bust bsr 10 rs k to incm sincm m1l k to ts kts *k to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * k to ts kts k16 16 20 20 24 24 28 28 28 srt bsr 11 ws *p to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * p16 16 20 20 24 24 28 28 28 srt bsr 12 rs *k to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * a total of 2 times k to ts kts k to incm m1r sincm work sts as they appear to borm 2 short row and 2 sts added to front bust if bust cup depth is 7 5 - 9 4 cm work increase round instructions on page 7 twice to add another 4 sts in total to the front bust then proceed to page 9 if bust cup depth is 9 5 - 11 4 cm continue as follows bsr 13 rs k to incm sincm m1l k to ts kts *k to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * k to ts kts k25 25 30 30 35 35 40 40 40 srt bsr 14 ws *p to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * p25 25 30 30 35 35 40 40 40 srt bsr 15 rs *k to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * a total of 2 times k to ts kts k to incm m1r sincm work sts as they appear to borm 2 short row and 2 sts added to front bust bsr 16 rs k to incm sincm m1l k to ts kts *k to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * k to ts kts k36 36 42 42 48 48 54 54 54 srt bsr 17 ws *p to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * p36 36 42 42 48 48 54 54 54 srt bsr 18 rs *k to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * a total of 2 times k to ts kts k to incm m1r sincm work sts as they appear to borm 2 short row and 2 sts added to front bust proceed to page 9 8 mc4 7-5 5 htped puc tsub mc4 9-5 7 htped puc tsub mc4 11-5 9 htped puc tsub pattern the body of the tee can be worked in stockinette alternative st pattern s or colorwork the placement of the colorwork texture or lace is entirely up to you the diagrams below highlight some examples with the yellow parts denoting where stockinette is substituted alternatively you can draw inspiration from what other knitters have made these substitutions can be done on the front only back only or on both front and back option 1 fully stockinette if you wish to you
